title: Model Risk Static-Hedging a Constrained Distributionally Robust Optimization approach
summary: We investigate model risk and distributionally robust optimization (DRO) under marginal and martingale constraints. Building on our previous work, we address the previously open case of static hedging with second-period maturity vanilla options and hedging strategies involving a vanilla payoff. We also extend recent sensitivity results to settings where admissible models must satisfy a martingale coupling constraint. Our approach relies on a weak implicit function theorem argument to construct families of measures satisfying the prescribed constraints. We derive closed-form sensitivity formulas and characterize the corresponding hedging strategies when the underlying process is real-valued.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了在边际和鞅约束下的模型风险和分布鲁棒优化，解决了静态对冲和敏感性分析中的开放问题
AI.motivation: 解决在边际和鞅约束下模型风险分析中的开放问题，特别是静态对冲策略和敏感性分析在鞅耦合约束下的扩展
AI.method: 使用弱隐函数定理构建满足约束的测度族，推导闭式敏感性公式，并刻画实值过程下的对冲策略
AI.result: 解决了静态对冲的开放案例，将敏感性结果扩展到鞅约束环境，获得了闭式敏感性公式和对冲策略特征
AI.conclusion: 该方法成功处理了边际和鞅约束下的模型风险问题，为分布鲁棒优化提供了理论框架和实用工具

title: Propagation of Chaos for Derivatives of McKean-Vlasov Stochastic Differential Equations and Applications
summary: As an enhanced version of existing results on Kac's propagation of chaos, which describes the convergence of mean-field particle systems to the independent McKean-Vlasov particle system as the number of particles tends to infinity, we prove the convergence at the level of derivatives with respect to the perturbations of initial value and noise, together with explicit convergence rates that can be sharp. As a consequence, the intrinsic derivative for the distribution of a single particle converges to that of an independent McKean-Vlasov SDE.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了在Kac传播混沌理论中，不仅粒子系统收敛到独立的McKean-Vlasov系统，而且其关于初始值和噪声扰动的导数也收敛，并给出了明确的收敛速率。
AI.motivation: 现有的Kac传播混沌理论描述了平均场粒子系统在粒子数趋于无穷时收敛到独立的McKean-Vlasov粒子系统，但缺乏对导数收敛性的研究。本文旨在填补这一空白，研究初始值和噪声扰动导数的收敛性。
AI.method: 作为现有Kac传播混沌结果的增强版本，证明了在初始值和噪声扰动下的导数收敛，并提供了明确的收敛速率，这些速率可以是尖锐的。
AI.result: 证明了导数收敛到独立的McKean-Vlasov随机微分方程，单个粒子分布的固有导数收敛到独立McKean-Vlasov SDE的相应导数。
AI.conclusion: 该研究扩展了传播混沌理论，不仅证明了粒子系统的收敛性，还证明了其导数的收敛性，为平均场粒子系统的敏感性分析提供了理论基础。

title: On The Cutoff Phenomenon For Dyson-Jacobi Processes
summary: We study the convergence to equilibrium of the Dyson-Jacobi process, a system of n interacting particles on the segment [0, 1] arising from Random Matrix Theory. We establish the occurence of a cutoff phenomenon for the intrinsic Wasserstein distance and provide an explicit formula for the associated mixing time.  Our approach relies on the interplay between the Riemannian geometry of the process and a flattened Euclidean representation obtained via a diffeomorphic deformation. This transformation allows us to transfer curvature-dimension inequalities from the Euclidean setting to the original space, thereby yielding sharp quantitative estimates.

AI.tldr: 研究Dyson-Jacobi过程在[0,1]区间上n个相互作用粒子的收敛到平衡态行为，发现了Wasserstein距离的截断现象，并给出了混合时间的显式公式。
AI.motivation: 研究来自随机矩阵理论的Dyson-Jacobi过程的收敛动力学，特别是其达到平衡态的速度和机制。
AI.method: 通过微分同胚变形获得平坦欧几里得表示，利用过程的黎曼几何与欧几里得表示之间的相互作用，将曲率-维数不等式从欧几里得设置转移到原始空间。
AI.result: 建立了内禀Wasserstein距离的截断现象，并提供了相关混合时间的显式公式。
AI.conclusion: 通过几何变换方法，成功分析了Dyson-Jacobi过程的收敛行为，获得了精确的定量估计。

title: On Portenko's approximation of skew Brownian motion
summary: From the perspective of the theory of operator semigroups, we reflect back on the classical theorem of Portenko devoted to approximation of skew Brownian motion. The theorem says that by concentrating the power of drift of a diffusion process around a point one obtains an equivalent of a semi-permeable membrane at this point, described by skew Brownian motion's boundary condition. We prove convergence of the corresponding Feller semigroups and in doing so, generalize Portenko's theorem to the case of the Walsh processes on star graphs. Our analysis leads through singular perturbations of Sturm--Liouville equations, and reveals that as a result of Portenko-type approximation parameters of Walsh processes are transformed in a simple and elegant manner.

AI.tldr: 从算子半群理论角度重新审视Portenko定理，证明通过集中扩散过程的漂移功率可以获得半透膜效应，并将该定理推广到星图上的Walsh过程
AI.motivation: 从算子半群理论的角度重新审视经典的Portenko定理，该定理表明通过集中扩散过程的漂移功率可以在某点获得半透膜效应。研究者希望将这一结果推广到更一般的星图上的Walsh过程。
AI.method: 采用算子半群理论框架，通过证明相应Feller半群的收敛性来推广Portenko定理。分析涉及Sturm-Liouville方程的奇异扰动，研究Portenko型近似如何优雅地变换Walsh过程的参数。
AI.result: 成功证明了相应Feller半群的收敛性，将Portenko定理推广到星图上的Walsh过程。分析揭示了Portenko型近似以简单优雅的方式变换Walsh过程的参数。
AI.conclusion: 从算子半群理论的角度重新审视Portenko定理不仅提供了新的理论视角，还成功将其推广到更一般的星图Walsh过程，揭示了参数变换的优雅数学结构。

title: Decoupling and randomization for double-indexed permutation statistics
summary: This paper introduces a version of decoupling and randomization to establish concentration inequalities for double-indexed permutation statistics. The results yield, among other applications, a new combinatorial Hanson-Wright inequality and a new combinatorial Bennett inequality. Several illustrative examples from rank-based statistics, graph-based statistics, and causal inference are also provided.

AI.tldr: 该论文通过引入解耦和随机化方法，建立了双索引置换统计量的集中不等式，得到了组合Hanson-Wright不等式和组合Bennett不等式等新结果。
AI.motivation: 研究双索引置换统计量的集中不等式，为秩统计量、图统计量和因果推断等应用提供理论工具。
AI.method: 引入解耦和随机化方法，建立双索引置换统计量的集中不等式。
AI.result: 获得了新的组合Hanson-Wright不等式和组合Bennett不等式，并提供了秩统计量、图统计量和因果推断等多个应用示例。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为双索引置换统计量的集中不等式分析提供了有效工具，在多个统计应用领域具有实用价值。

title: Randomized Feasibility Methods for Constrained Optimization with Adaptive Step Sizes
summary: We consider minimizing an objective function subject to constraints defined by the intersection of lower-level sets of convex functions. We study two cases: (i) strongly convex and Lipschitz-smooth objective function and (ii) convex but possibly nonsmooth objective function. To deal with the constraints that are not easy to project on, we use a randomized feasibility algorithm with Polyak steps and a random number of sampled constraints per iteration, while taking (sub)gradient steps to minimize the objective function. For case (i), we prove linear convergence in expectation of the objective function values to any prescribed tolerance using an adaptive stepsize. For case (ii), we develop a fully problem parameter-free and adaptive stepsize scheme that yields an $O(1/\sqrt{T})$ worst-case rate in expectation. The infeasibility of the iterates decreases geometrically with the number of feasibility updates almost surely, while for the averaged iterates, we establish an expected lower bound on the function values relative to the optimal value that depends on the distribution for the random number of sampled constraints. For certain choices of sample-size growth, optimal rates are achieved. Finally, simulations on a Quadratically Constrained Quadratic Programming (QCQP) problem and Support Vector Machines (SVM) demonstrate the computational efficiency of our algorithm compared to other state-of-the-art methods.

AI.tldr: 提出一种处理凸函数下层集交集约束的随机优化算法，针对强凸光滑和凸非光滑两种目标函数情况，使用随机可行性算法和Polyak步长，证明线性收敛和次线性收敛率。
AI.motivation: 解决在凸函数下层集交集约束下的优化问题，这些约束通常难以直接投影处理，需要开发有效的随机算法来处理复杂约束并保证收敛性。
AI.method: 使用随机可行性算法结合Polyak步长，每次迭代随机采样约束子集，同时对目标函数进行（次）梯度下降。针对强凸光滑情况采用自适应步长，针对凸非光滑情况开发完全参数无关的自适应步长方案。
AI.result: 对于强凸光滑目标函数，证明目标函数值以线性收敛速率收敛到任意预设容差；对于凸非光滑目标函数，获得O(1/√T)的最坏情况期望收敛率。迭代点的不可行性几乎必然几何下降，平均迭代点相对于最优值的函数值有期望下界。
AI.conclusion: 提出的随机算法在处理复杂约束优化问题时计算高效，在QCQP和SVM问题上的仿真实验表明其优于现有先进方法，特别适用于难以直接投影的约束场景。

title: New Adaptive Numerical Methods Based on Dual Formulation of Hyperbolic Conservation Laws
summary: In this paper, we propose an adaptive high-order method for hyperbolic systems of conservation laws. The proposed method is based on a dual formulation approach: Two numerical solutions, corresponding to conservative and nonconservative formulations of the same system, are evolved simultaneously. Since nonconservative schemes are known to produce nonphysical weak solutions near discontinuities, we exploit the difference between these two solutions to construct a smoothness indicator (SI). In smooth regions, the difference between the conservative and nonconservative solutions is of the same order as the truncation error of the underlying discretization, whereas in nonsmooth regions, it is ${\cal O}(1)$. We apply this idea to the Euler equations of gas dynamics and define the SI using differences in the momentum and pressure variables. This choice allows us to further distinguish neighborhoods of contact discontinuities from other nonsmooth parts of the computed solution. The resulting classification is used to adaptively select numerical discretizations. In the vicinities of contact discontinuities, we employ the low-dissipation central-upwind numerical flux and a second-order piecewise linear reconstruction with the slopes computed using an overcompressive SBM limiter. Elsewhere, we use an alternative weighted essentially non-oscillatory (A-WENO) framework with the central-upwind finite-volume numerical fluxes and either unlimited (in smooth regions) or Ai-WENO-Z (in the nonsmooth regions away from contact discontinuities) fifth-order interpolation. Numerical results for the one- and two-dimensional compressible Euler equations show that the proposed adaptive method improves both the computational efficiency and resolution of complex flow features compared with the non-adaptive fifth-order A-WENO scheme.

AI.tldr: 提出一种自适应高阶方法用于双曲守恒律系统，基于保守和非保守两种公式同时演化数值解，利用两者差异构建光滑度指示器，自适应选择数值离散格式以提高计算效率和分辨率。
AI.motivation: 传统非保守格式在间断附近会产生非物理弱解，而保守格式在光滑区域有高精度。需要一种自适应方法，在不同区域使用合适的数值格式，既能保持高精度又能处理间断问题。
AI.method: 采用对偶公式方法：同时演化保守和非保守两种公式的数值解。利用两者差异构建光滑度指示器（SI），在光滑区域差异为截断误差量级，在非光滑区域为O(1)。对欧拉方程，使用动量和压力变量差异定义SI，能区分接触间断与其他非光滑区域。基于分类结果自适应选择数值离散格式：在接触间断附近使用低耗散中心迎风数值通量和二阶分段线性重构；在其他区域使用A-WENO框架，光滑区域用无限制五阶插值，非光滑区域用Ai-WENO-Z五阶插值。
AI.result: 对一维和二维可压缩欧拉方程的数值结果表明，相比非自适应五阶A-WENO格式，提出的自适应方法在计算效率和复杂流动特征分辨率方面都有显著改进。
AI.conclusion: 提出的自适应高阶方法通过同时演化保守和非保守公式，利用两者差异构建光滑度指示器，实现了对不同流动区域的自适应离散格式选择，在保持高精度的同时提高了计算效率和分辨率。

title: Spectral Diffusion Models on the Sphere
summary:
Diffusion models provide a principled framework for generative modeling via stochastic differential equations and time-reversed dynamics. Extending spectral diffusion approaches to spherical data, however, raises nontrivial geometric and stochastic issues that are absent in the Euclidean setting.
  In this work, we develop a diffusion modeling framework defined directly on finite-dimensional spherical harmonic representations of real-valued functions on the sphere. We show that the spherical discrete Fourier transform maps spatial Brownian motion to a constrained Gaussian process in the frequency domain with deterministic, generally non-isotropic covariance. This induces modified forward and reverse-time stochastic differential equations in the spectral domain.
  As a consequence, spatial and spectral score matching objectives are no longer equivalent, even in the band-limited setting, and the frequency-domain formulation introduces a geometry-dependent inductive bias. We derive the corresponding diffusion equations and characterize the induced noise covariance.

AI.tldr: 该研究将扩散模型扩展到球面数据，通过球谐函数表示在频域构建扩散框架，发现空间与谱域得分匹配目标不再等价，并推导了相应的扩散方程和噪声协方差。
AI.motivation: 将谱扩散方法扩展到球面数据时，存在欧几里得空间中不存在的几何和随机性问题，需要开发直接在球谐函数表示上定义的扩散建模框架。
AI.method: 在球面实值函数的有限维球谐函数表示上直接定义扩散建模框架，利用球面离散傅里叶变换将空间布朗运动映射到频域中的约束高斯过程，推导修改后的正向和反向时间随机微分方程。
AI.result: 发现空间和谱得分匹配目标在带限设置下也不再等价，频域公式引入了几何相关的归纳偏置，推导了相应的扩散方程并表征了诱导的噪声协方差。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为球面数据的扩散建模提供了理论基础，揭示了球面几何对扩散过程的独特影响，为球面生成建模开辟了新途径。

title: A Fokker-Planck Framework for Control of Epidemics
summary: We present a control framework for stochastic compartmental models in epidemiology. In this framework, rather than directly controlling the stochastic system, we perform optimal control of an associated Fokker-Planck equation, with the goal of steering the distribution of possible solutions of the stochastic system to some desirable state. In particular, this allows for robust control mechanism with uncertainty not only in the dynamics, but also in the initial data. We formulate and fully analyze a partial differential equation constrained optimization problem, including a proof of existence of optimal controls via analysis of the control-to-state map, and a characterization of optimal controls via the Pontryagin minimum principle. We describe the application of the sequential quadratic Hamiltonian method to our problem, which provides numerical approximations of optimal control maps. We demonstrate our method using a minimal stochastic susceptible-infected-recovered model with different choices of cost functionals that represent different policy-maker concerns.

AI.tldr: 提出一个用于流行病学随机隔室模型的控制框架，通过控制相关的Fokker-Planck方程来引导随机系统解的分布，实现鲁棒控制
AI.motivation: 传统随机系统直接控制方法在处理不确定性和初始数据变化时存在局限性，需要一种能够引导整个概率分布而不仅仅是单个轨迹的鲁棒控制框架
AI.method: 通过控制与随机系统相关的Fokker-Planck方程，将随机控制问题转化为偏微分方程约束优化问题，使用序列二次哈密顿方法进行数值求解
AI.result: 建立了完整的数学分析框架，证明了最优控制的存在性，通过庞特里亚金最小值原理刻画了最优控制，并在随机SIR模型上验证了方法的有效性
AI.conclusion: 该框架为流行病学中的随机隔室模型提供了鲁棒的控制方法，能够处理动态和初始数据的不确定性，适用于不同政策制定者关注的各种成本函数

title: Optimal matching under size priority
summary:
Past studies on the local limit of maximal weight matchings in edge-weighted large random graphs rely fundamentally on the assumption that the weights are atomless, which ensures that the maximal weight matching is unique. This excludes de facto maximal size matchings that correspond to equal edge-weights. In this work, we overcome this difficulty by assigning i.i.d.~atomless weights to edges and choosing the maximal size matching that maximises the weight. We call these doubly constrained matchings \emph{optimal matchings}. The natural generalisation of optimal matchings for infinite unimodular random graphs are unimodular matchings of maximal density at the root that maximise the expected weight at the root when it is matched.
  For unimodular Bienaymé-Galton-Watson (UBGW) trees and for a broad class of weight distributions, we show existence and uniqueness in law of such matchings. We also prove that if a sequence of finite random weighted graphs converges locally to an UBGW tree with i.i.d.~weights, then there exists a sequence of matchings on the finite graphs that converges locally to the optimal matching on the limiting tree. Finally, we identify a regime, depending only on the offspring distribution of the limiting tree, in which correlations between edge states in the optimal matching decay exponentially with their graph distance. In this regime, we strengthen the previous convergence to the convergence of optimal matchings of the finite graphs. As a by-product, we can explicitly compute the asymptotic densities of edges that belong to all maximal-density matchings, and of edges that belong to none.

AI.tldr: 研究克服了以往最大权重匹配研究中要求权重无原子的限制，通过引入"最优匹配"概念，在无限单模随机图上研究最大密度匹配，并在UBGW树上证明了存在性、唯一性和局部收敛性。
AI.motivation: 以往关于边加权大随机图中最大权重匹配局部极限的研究都基于权重无原子的假设，这排除了边权重相等时的最大规模匹配。本研究旨在克服这一限制，研究更一般的匹配问题。
AI.method: 为边分配独立同分布的无原子权重，并选择最大化权重的最大规模匹配（称为"最优匹配"）。将这一概念推广到无限单模随机图上，研究单模匹配的最大密度和最大期望权重。针对单模Bienaymé-Galton-Watson树和广泛的权重分布，分析最优匹配的性质。
AI.result: 证明了在UBGW树上最优匹配的存在性和唯一性；当有限随机加权图序列局部收敛到UBGW树时，存在匹配序列局部收敛到极限树上的最优匹配；识别了相关性指数衰减的机制，并在此机制下加强了收敛性结果。
AI.conclusion: 本研究成功克服了以往最大权重匹配研究中的技术限制，建立了最优匹配在无限单模随机图上的理论框架，并获得了重要的收敛性和相关性衰减结果，为分析最大密度匹配的渐近性质提供了新工具。

title: Concentration Inequalities for Exchangeable Tensors and Matrix-valued Data
summary:
We study concentration inequalities for structured weighted sums of random data, including (i) tensor inner products and (ii) sequential matrix sums. We are interested in tail bounds and concentration inequalities for those structured weighted sums under exchangeability, extending beyond the classical framework of independent terms.
  We develop Hoeffding and Bernstein bounds provided with structure-dependent exchangeability. Along the way, we recover known results in weighted sum of exchangeable random variables and i.i.d. sums of random matrices to the optimal constants. Notably, we develop a sharper concentration bound for combinatorial sum of matrix arrays than the results previously derived from Chatterjee's method of exchangeable pairs.
  For applications, the richer structures provide us with novel analytical tools for estimating the average effect of multi-factor response models and studying fixed-design sketching methods in federated averaging. We apply our results to these problems, and find that our theoretical predictions are corroborated by numerical evidence.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了具有结构权重的随机数据和的集中不等式，包括张量内积和序列矩阵和，在可交换性框架下扩展了经典独立项的结果。
AI.motivation: 研究结构化加权随机和的集中不等式，超越经典的独立项框架，在可交换性条件下为张量内积和序列矩阵和提供尾界和集中不等式。
AI.method: 开发具有结构依赖可交换性的Hoeffding和Bernstein界，恢复可交换随机变量加权和与随机矩阵独立同分布和的最优常数结果，为矩阵数组的组合和提供比Chatterjee可交换对方法更尖锐的集中界。
AI.result: 获得了结构化加权和的集中不等式，为多因子响应模型的平均效应估计和联邦平均中的固定设计草图方法提供了新的分析工具，理论预测得到数值证据支持。
AI.conclusion: 该研究扩展了集中不等式理论到结构化加权可交换随机和，为实际应用如多因子响应模型和联邦学习提供了更精确的理论工具。

title: A mixed virtual element discretization for the generalized Oseen problem
summary: In this paper we introduce a mixed virtual element method to approximate the solution for the two dimensional generalized Oseen problem. We introduce the pseudostress as an additional unknown, which allows to eliminate the pressure from the system; the pressure can be recovered via a post-process of the pseudostress tensor. We prove existence and uniqueness of the continuous solution via a fixed point argument. Under standard mesh assumptions, we develop a virtual element method to approximate both the tensor and the velocity field, and we show that it is stable. Furthermore, we provide a priori error estimates for the method and validate them through a series of numerical tests using different polygonal meshes.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种混合虚拟元方法用于近似二维广义Oseen问题的解，通过引入伪应力作为额外未知量来消除压力，压力可通过后处理恢复。
AI.motivation: 针对二维广义Oseen问题的数值求解，需要开发稳定且高效的数值方法。通过引入伪应力作为额外变量，可以简化系统并消除压力变量，从而提高计算效率。

title: Necessary and Sufficient Conditions for Existence of a Unique Solution to Gamma Moment Closure for the Stochastic Ricker Equation
summary: This paper investigates the stochastic Ricker difference equation $X_{n+1} = X_n \exp(r(1-X_n)) \varepsilon_n$, where $X_n$ is a random variable representing the population size and $\{\varepsilon_n\}$ denotes independent random perturbations with $E[\varepsilon_n] = 1$ and $E[\varepsilon_n^2] = v > 1$. We derive a closed system of difference equations for the mean and variance of $X_n$ using the Gamma moment-closure technique and numerically verify the validity of the Gamma moment-closure approximation. By constructing an auxiliary function, we establish the necessary and sufficient condition, $v < (2 - e^{-r})^2$, for the existence of the positive unique feasible equilibrium. We further verify its local stability with numerical analysis. Monte Carlo simulations confirm the validity of the Gamma moment approximation and illustrate how the interplay between the intrinsic growth rate $r$ and noise intensity $v$ determines population persistence. The results provide a unified theoretical framework for analyzing stochastic Gamma dynamics, offering new biological insights into the stabilizing and destabilizing effects of environmental variability.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了随机Ricker差分方程，使用Gamma矩闭合技术推导了均值和方差的闭合差分方程系统，建立了正唯一可行平衡点存在的充要条件，并通过数值分析和蒙特卡洛模拟验证了Gamma矩近似的有效性。
AI.motivation: 研究环境随机性对种群动态的影响，特别是随机Ricker差分方程中内在增长率r和噪声强度v如何共同决定种群持续性，为分析随机Gamma动力学提供统一的理论框架。
AI.method: 使用Gamma矩闭合技术推导均值和方差的闭合差分方程系统；构造辅助函数建立正唯一可行平衡点存在的充要条件；通过数值分析验证局部稳定性；采用蒙特卡洛模拟验证Gamma矩近似的有效性。
AI.result: 建立了正唯一可行平衡点存在的充要条件：v < (2 - e^{-r})^2；验证了Gamma矩闭合近似的有效性；揭示了内在增长率r和噪声强度v的相互作用如何决定种群持续性；证明了环境变异性的稳定和失稳效应。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为分析随机Gamma动力学提供了统一的理论框架，提供了关于环境变异性稳定和失稳效应的新生物学见解，有助于理解环境随机性对种群动态的影响机制。

title: Partial heteroscedastic deconvolution estimation in nonparametric regression
summary: In this paper, we consider a partial deconvolution kernel estimator for nonparametric regression when some covariates are measured with error while others are observed without error. We focus on a general and realistic setting in which the measurement errors are heteroscedastic. We propose a kernel-based estimator of the regression function in this framework and show that it achieves the optimal convergence rate under suitable regularity conditions. The finite-sample performance of the proposed estimator is illustrated through simulation studies.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种用于部分变量存在测量误差的非参数回归的核估计方法，适用于异方差测量误差场景
AI.motivation: 在实际回归分析中，经常遇到部分协变量存在测量误差而其他协变量准确观测的情况，且测量误差通常是异方差的，现有方法对此处理不足

AI.conclusion: 该方法为处理部分变量存在异方差测量误差的非参数回归问题提供了有效的解决方案

title: A novel neural network with predefined-time stability for solving generalized monotone inclusion problems with applications
summary:
We propose a novel dynamical framework for solving inclusion
  problems of the form \(0 \in F(x) + G(x)\) in Hilbert spaces, where \(F\) is a
  maximal set-valued operator and \(G\) is a single-valued mapping. The analysis is
  conducted under a generalized monotonicity assumption, which relaxes the
  classical monotonicity conditions commonly imposed in the literature and thereby
  extends the applicability of the proposed approach.
  Under mild conditions on the system parameters, we establish both fixed-time and
  predefined-time stability of the resulting dynamical system. The fixed-time
  stability guarantees a uniform upper bound on the settling time that is
  independent of the initial condition, whereas the predefined-time stability
  framework allows the system parameters to be selected \emph{a priori} in order
  to ensure convergence within a user-specified time horizon.
  Moreover, we investigate an explicit forward Euler discretization of the
  continuous-time dynamics, leading to a novel forward--backward iterative
  algorithm. A rigorous convergence analysis of the resulting discrete scheme is
  provided. Finally, the effectiveness and versatility of the proposed method are
  illustrated through several classes of problems, including constrained
  optimization problems, mixed variational inequalities, and variational
  inequalities, together with numerical experiments that corroborate the
  theoretical results.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种解决希尔伯特空间中包含问题0∈F(x)+G(x)的新动力学框架，其中F是极大集值算子，G是单值映射。该框架在广义单调性假设下分析，放宽了经典单调性条件，扩展了方法适用性。建立了固定时间和预定义时间稳定性，并研究了显式前向欧拉离散化得到前向-后向迭代算法。
AI.motivation: 传统方法通常需要较强的单调性条件，限制了在更广泛问题中的应用。本文旨在提出一个更通用的动力学框架，能够在广义单调性假设下解决包含问题，同时实现固定时间和预定义时间收敛，提高算法的实用性和灵活性。
AI.method: 提出了一种新颖的动力学框架来解决希尔伯特空间中的包含问题。在广义单调性假设下进行分析，放宽了经典单调性条件。建立了系统的固定时间稳定性（收敛时间与初始条件无关）和预定义时间稳定性（可预先指定收敛时间）。进一步研究了连续时间动力学的显式前向欧拉离散化，得到了一种前向-后向迭代算法。
AI.result: 在系统参数的温和条件下，证明了所得动力学系统的固定时间稳定性和预定义时间稳定性。对离散化方案进行了严格的收敛性分析。通过约束优化问题、混合变分不等式和变分不等式等多个问题类别验证了方法的有效性和通用性，数值实验也证实了理论结果。
AI.conclusion: 提出的动力学框架在广义单调性假设下有效解决了包含问题，扩展了传统方法的适用范围。固定时间和预定义时间稳定性特性提供了更灵活和实用的收敛保证。离散化得到的前向-后向迭代算法具有良好的收敛性能，适用于多种实际问题。

title: Improving Smoothed Aggregation AMG Robustness on Stretched Mesh Applications
summary:
Strength-of-connection algorithms play a key role in algebraic multigrid (AMG). Specifically, they determine which matrix nonzeros are classified as weak and so ignored when coarsening matrix graphs and defining interpolation sparsity patterns. The general goal is to encourage coarsening only in directions where error can be smoothed and to avoid coarsening across sharp problem variations. Unfortunately, developing robust and inexpensive strength-of-connection schemes is challenging.
  The classification of matrix nonzeros involves four aspects: (a) choosing a strength-of-connection matrix, (b) scaling its values, (c) choosing a criterion to classify scaled values as strong or weak, and (d) dropping weak entries which includes adjusting matrix values to account for dropped terms. Typically, smoothed aggregation AMG uses the linear system being solved as a strength-of-connection matrix. It scales values symmetrically using square-roots of the matrix diagonal. It classifies based on whether scaled values are above or below a threshold. Finally, it adjusts matrix values by modifying the diagonal so that the sum of entries within each row of the dropped matrix matches that of the original. While these procedures can work well, we illustrate failure cases that motivate alternatives. The first alternative uses a distance Laplacian strength-of-connection matrix. The second centers on non-symmetric scaling. We then investigate alternative classification criteria based on identifying gaps in the values of the scaled entries. Finally, an alternative lumping procedure is proposed where row sums are preserved by modifying all retained matrix entries (as opposed to just diagonal entries). A series of numerical results illustrates trade-offs demonstrating in some cases notably more robust convergence on matrices coming from linear finite elements on stretched meshes.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了代数多重网格中连接强度算法的改进方案，针对现有方法在拉伸网格上的失效情况，提出了四种替代方案：距离拉普拉斯矩阵、非对称缩放、基于数值间隙的分类标准以及改进的集总方法。
AI.motivation: 现有连接强度算法在确定矩阵非零元强弱分类时存在不足，特别是在拉伸网格上可能导致收敛失败。论文旨在开发更鲁棒且经济的连接强度方案，以改善代数多重网格的收敛性能。
AI.method: 提出了四种改进方案：1）使用距离拉普拉斯矩阵作为连接强度矩阵；2）采用非对称缩放方法；3）基于缩放后数值间隙的分类标准；4）通过修改所有保留矩阵元素（而非仅对角线）来保持行和的集总方法。
AI.result: 数值实验表明，新方法在来自拉伸网格线性有限元的矩阵上，相比传统方法展现出更鲁棒的收敛性能，特别是在某些情况下显著改善了收敛效果。
AI.conclusion: 论文提出的替代连接强度算法方案能够有效解决传统方法在拉伸网格上的失效问题，通过不同的矩阵选择、缩放方式、分类标准和集总方法，实现了更鲁棒的代数多重网格收敛性能。

title: Uniqueness of invariant measures for stochastic damped anisotropic Navier--Stokes equations
summary: We study a two-dimensional Navier--Stokes system with anisotropic viscosity, linear damping term, and an additive noise on the whole space $\mathbb{R}^2$. For this model we prove uniqueness of invariant measures when the damping coefficient is sufficiently large compared to the noise intensity. The argument is based on an asymptotic coupling method and relies on anisotropic energy estimates together with exponential-type estimates for the $H^1$-energy. Since no Poincaré inequality is available on $\mathbb{R}^2$, the damping term is essential even for the existence of invariant measures. Our result applies to general additive noise without any non-degeneracy condition and remains valid even in the deterministic case $σ\equiv0$.

AI.tldr: 研究二维各向异性粘性Navier-Stokes系统在阻尼系数足够大时的唯一遍历性
AI.motivation: 研究带有各向异性粘性、线性阻尼项和加性噪声的二维Navier-Stokes系统在无界域上的遍历性行为，特别关注在缺乏Poincaré不等式的全空间上如何保证不变测度的存在性和唯一性。
AI.method: 采用渐近耦合方法，结合各向异性能量估计和H^1能量的指数型估计，在阻尼系数足够大时证明不变测度的唯一性。
AI.result: 当阻尼系数足够大（相对于噪声强度）时，系统存在唯一的不变测度。该结果适用于一般加性噪声（无需非退化条件），甚至在确定性情况（σ≡0）下也成立。
AI.conclusion: 在二维全空间上，各向异性粘性Navier-Stokes系统的阻尼项对于不变测度的存在至关重要，当阻尼足够强时系统具有唯一的遍历测度，这一结果对一般加性噪声和确定性情况都适用。

title: Blessing of dimensionality in cross-validated bandwidth selection on the sphere
comment: 25 pages, 6 figures, 2 tables. Supplementary material: 43 pages, 4 figures
summary: We study the asymptotic behavior of least-squares cross-validation bandwidth selection in kernel density estimation on the $d$-dimensional hypersphere, $d\geq 1$. We show that the exact rate of convergence with respect to the optimal bandwidth minimizing the mean integrated squared error, shown to exist under mild non-uniformity conditions, is $n^{-d/(2d+8)}$, thus approaching the $n^{-1/2}$ parametric rate as $d$ grows. This ``blessing of dimensionality'' in bandwidth selection offers theoretical support for utilizing the conceptually simpler cross-validation selector over plug-in techniques for larger dimensions $d$. We compare this result for bandwidth estimation on the $d$-dimensional Euclidean space through explicit expressions for the asymptotic variance functionals. Numerical experiments corroborate the speed of this convergence in an array of scenarios and dimensions, precisely illustrating the tipping dimension where cross-validation outperforms plug-in approaches.

AI.tldr: 论文研究了d维超球面上核密度估计中最小二乘交叉验证带宽选择的渐近行为，发现收敛速度为n^{-d/(2d+8)}，随着维度d增加接近参数速率n^{-1/2}，支持在高维情况下使用交叉验证而非插件方法。
AI.motivation: 研究d维超球面上核密度估计中带宽选择的渐近性能，特别是比较交叉验证与插件方法在不同维度下的表现，为高维数据提供理论指导。
AI.method: 使用最小二乘交叉验证方法进行带宽选择，分析其在d维超球面上的渐近行为，推导收敛速率，并与欧几里得空间的结果进行比较。
AI.result: 发现交叉验证带宽选择的收敛速率为n^{-d/(2d+8)}，随着维度d增加接近参数速率n^{-1/2}，存在一个临界维度使得交叉验证优于插件方法。
AI.conclusion: 高维情况下交叉验证带宽选择具有"维度祝福"效应，收敛速度更快，为在高维数据中使用概念更简单的交叉验证方法提供了理论支持。

title: Data-Driven Structured Control for Continuous-Time LTI Systems
summary: This paper addresses the data-driven structured controller design problem for continuous-time linear time-invariant (LTI) systems. We consider three control objectives, including stabilization, $H_2$ performance, and $H_\infty$ performance. Using the collected data, we construct a minimal matrix ellipsoid that contains all admissible system matrices. We propose some linearization techniques that enable us to incorporate the structural constraint on the controller, which motivates an iterative algorithm for each control objective. Finally, we provide some numerical examples to demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed methods.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了连续时间线性时不变系统的数据驱动结构化控制器设计问题，提出了基于数据构建系统矩阵椭球的方法，并开发了处理控制器结构约束的线性化技术和迭代算法。
AI.motivation: 传统控制器设计通常需要精确的系统模型，但在实际应用中，系统模型往往难以准确获得。数据驱动方法可以直接利用测量数据设计控制器，避免了建模误差。然而，现有数据驱动方法在处理控制器结构约束方面存在不足，需要开发能够同时考虑控制目标和结构约束的数据驱动设计方法。
AI.method: 1. 使用收集的数据构建包含所有可接受系统矩阵的最小矩阵椭球；2. 提出线性化技术将控制器结构约束纳入设计框架；3. 针对稳定化、H₂性能和H∞性能三个控制目标，分别开发迭代算法；4. 通过数值算例验证方法的有效性。
AI.result: 提出的方法能够有效处理连续时间LTI系统的数据驱动结构化控制器设计问题。数值算例表明，该方法能够成功设计满足结构约束的控制器，同时实现稳定化、H₂性能和H∞性能等控制目标，验证了所提方法的有效性和实用性。
AI.conclusion: 本文提出了一种基于数据驱动的方法来解决连续时间LTI系统的结构化控制器设计问题。通过构建系统矩阵椭球和开发线性化技术，成功将控制器结构约束纳入设计框架。针对不同控制目标提出的迭代算法在实际应用中表现出良好的性能，为数据驱动控制设计提供了新的解决方案。

title: Error estimates of $hp$-finite element method for elliptic optimal control problems with robin boundary
summary: A priori and a posteriori error analysis of $hp$ finite element method for elliptic control problem with Robin boundary condition and boundary observation are presented. are presented. Through the Clément-type approach and the construction of an auxiliary system, we derived a priori error estimates for the elliptic optimal control problem. Residual-based a posteriori error estimates are derived based on the well-known Scott-Zhang-type quasi-interpolation and coupled state-control approximations, thus establishing an a posteriori error estimator for the $hp$ finite element method. The numerical example demonstrates the accuracy of error estimation for the elliptic optimal control problems with Robin boundary.

AI.tldr: 本文对具有Robin边界条件和边界观测的椭圆控制问题，提出了hp有限元方法的先验和后验误差分析，通过Clement型方法和辅助系统推导了先验误差估计，基于Scott-Zhang型拟插值和状态-控制耦合近似推导了后验误差估计。
AI.motivation: 研究具有Robin边界条件和边界观测的椭圆最优控制问题的hp有限元方法误差分析，为这类边界控制问题提供理论保证和实用的误差估计工具。
AI.method: 采用Clement型方法构造辅助系统推导先验误差估计；基于Scott-Zhang型拟插值和状态-控制耦合近似推导残差型后验误差估计，建立hp有限元方法的误差估计器。
AI.result: 成功推导了椭圆最优控制问题的先验误差估计和后验误差估计，数值算例验证了Robin边界条件下椭圆最优控制问题误差估计的准确性。
AI.conclusion: 本文为具有Robin边界条件和边界观测的椭圆控制问题建立了完整的hp有限元误差分析框架，包括先验和后验误差估计，为实际计算提供了理论指导和误差控制工具。

title: Small Ball Probabilities for the Stochastic Heat Equation on Compact Manifolds
summary: We consider the stochastic heat equation on a compact smooth Riemannian manifold without boundary satisfying \begin{equation*} \partial_tu(t,x)=\frac{1}{2}Δ_Mu(t,x)+σ(t,x,u)\dot{W}(t,x),\quad (t,x)\in\mathbb{R}_+\times M, \end{equation*} where $\dot{W}$ is a centered Gaussian noise that is white in time and colored in space. Assuming that $σ$ is Lipschitz in $u$ and uniformly bounded, we estimate small ball probabilities for the solution $u$ when $u(0,x)\equiv 0$.

AI.tldr: 研究紧致光滑无边黎曼流形上随机热方程的小球概率估计，其中噪声在时间上白噪声、空间上相关，系数满足Lipschitz条件且有界
AI.motivation: 研究随机偏微分方程解的概率分布特性，特别是小球概率（小偏差概率）的估计，这对于理解随机过程的局部行为有重要意义
AI.method: 在紧致光滑无边黎曼流形上考虑随机热方程，假设噪声在时间上是白噪声、空间上相关，系数满足Lipschitz条件且有界，初始条件为零，通过分析方程解的概率分布特性来估计小球概率
AI.result: 得到了随机热方程解的小球概率估计，为理解随机过程在黎曼流形上的局部行为提供了定量分析工具
AI.conclusion: 在紧致光滑无边黎曼流形上，对于满足Lipschitz条件和有界性的随机热方程，可以估计其解的小球概率，这扩展了随机偏微分方程概率性质的研究

title: Improved Computational Lower Bound of Estimation for Multi-Frequency Group Synchronization
summary: We study the computational phase transition in a multi-frequency group synchronization problem, where pairwise relative measurements of group elements are observed across multiple frequency channels and corrupted by Gaussian noise. Using the framework of \emph{low-degree polynomial algorithms}, we analyze the task of estimating the structured signal in such observations. We show that, assuming the low-degree heuristic, in synchronization models over the circle group $\mathsf{SO}(2)$, a simple spectral method is computationally optimal among all polynomial-time estimators when the number of frequencies satisfies $L=n^{o(1)}$. This significantly extends prior work \cite{KBK24+}, which only applied to a fixed constant number of frequencies. Together with known upper bounds on the statistical threshold \cite{PWBM18a}, our results establish the existence of a \emph{statistical-to-computational gap} in this model when the number of frequencies is sufficiently large.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了多频群同步问题中的计算相变，证明了在圆群SO(2)上，当频率数L=n^{o(1)}时，简单的谱方法在所有多项式时间估计器中是计算最优的，并建立了统计-计算差距的存在性。
AI.motivation: 研究多频群同步问题中计算相变的性质，特别是当频率数量较大时，分析多项式时间算法的计算极限，并探索统计阈值与计算阈值之间的差距。
AI.method: 使用低阶多项式算法框架，分析圆群SO(2)上的同步模型，证明当频率数L=n^{o(1)}时，简单的谱方法是计算最优的。
AI.result: 证明了在圆群SO(2)同步模型中，当频率数满足L=n^{o(1)}时，谱方法在所有多项式时间估计器中是计算最优的，显著扩展了先前仅适用于固定常数频率数的工作。
AI.conclusion: 结合已知的统计阈值上界，研究结果建立了当频率数足够大时该模型中统计-计算差距的存在性，为理解多频同步问题的计算复杂性提供了理论依据。

title: A direct sampling method for magnetic induction tomography
summary: This paper proposes a direct sampling method for the inverse problem of magnetic induction tomography (MIT). Our approach defines a class of point spread functions with explicit expressions, which are computed via inner products, leading to a simple and fast imaging process. We then prove that these point spread functions decay with distance, establishing the theoretical basis of the algorithm. Specific expressions for special cases are also derived to visually demonstrate their attenuation pattern. Numerical experimental results further confirm the efficiency and accuracy of the proposed algorithm.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种用于磁感应层析成像逆问题的直接采样方法，通过定义具有显式表达式的点扩散函数类，实现简单快速的成像过程。
AI.motivation: 磁感应层析成像（MIT）的逆问题需要高效准确的成像方法。传统方法可能计算复杂或效率不高，因此需要开发一种简单快速且理论可靠的方法。
AI.method: 定义了一类具有显式表达式的点扩散函数，通过内积计算，形成直接采样方法。证明了这些点扩散函数随距离衰减的特性，并推导了特殊情况的特定表达式。
AI.result: 数值实验结果证实了所提算法的高效性和准确性，点扩散函数的衰减特性为算法提供了理论依据。
AI.conclusion: 提出的直接采样方法为磁感应层析成像逆问题提供了一种简单、快速且理论可靠的解决方案，具有实际应用价值。

title: Spectral Bayesian Regression on the Sphere
summary:
We develop a fully intrinsic Bayesian framework for nonparametric regression on the unit sphere based on isotropic Gaussian field priors and the harmonic structure induced by the Laplace-Beltrami operator. Under uniform random design, the regression model admits an exact diagonalization in the spherical harmonic basis, yielding a Gaussian sequence representation with frequency-dependent multiplicities.
  Exploiting this structure, we derive closed-form posterior distributions, optimal spectral truncation schemes, and sharp posterior contraction rates under integrated squared loss. For Gaussian priors with polynomially decaying angular power spectra, including spherical Matérn priors, we establish posterior contraction rates over Sobolev classes, which are minimax-optimal under correct prior calibration.
  We further show that the posterior mean admits an exact variational characterization as a geometrically intrinsic penalized least-squares estimator, equivalent to a Laplace-Beltrami smoothing spline.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种基于各向同性高斯场先验和Laplace-Beltrami算子的单位球面上非参数回归的完全内在贝叶斯框架，通过球谐基实现精确对角化，得到具有频率依赖多重性的高斯序列表示。
AI.motivation: 开发一个完全内在的贝叶斯框架来处理单位球面上的非参数回归问题，利用球面的几何结构和Laplace-Beltrami算子的谐波特性，避免依赖外部坐标系，实现几何内在的统计推断。
AI.method: 基于各向同性高斯场先验和Laplace-Beltrami算子，在均匀随机设计下，利用球谐基对回归模型进行精确对角化，得到高斯序列表示。推导闭式后验分布、最优谱截断方案，并分析后验收缩率。
AI.result: 对于具有多项式衰减角功率谱的高斯先验（包括球面Matérn先验），建立了Sobolev类上的后验收缩率，在先验正确校准下达到极小极大最优。后验均值具有精确变分特征，等价于Laplace-Beltrami平滑样条。
AI.conclusion: 该框架为球面非参数回归提供了一个几何内在的贝叶斯方法，通过谐波结构实现精确计算，在正确先验校准下达到最优统计性能，并将后验均值解释为几何内在的惩罚最小二乘估计器。

title: Reinforcement Learning for Dividend Optimization in Partially Observed Regime-Switching Diffusion Model
summary: This paper studies the optimal dividend problem with a bounded payout rate in a partially observed regime-switching diffusion model, where, in practice, the market regime is unobserved and key model parameters are unknown. To address this partial-information setting, we propose a continuous-time reinforcement learning (RL) approach within an exploratory (entropy-regularized) stochastic control framework for discounted dividends under regime switching. The associated exploratory Hamilton-Jacobi-Bellman (HJB) system admits semi-analytical characterizations of the value function and the optimal exploratory dividend policy, determined by two unknown functions solving two ordinary differential equations (ODEs) together with positive real roots of the induced quadratic equations. Exploiting this structure, we introduce parametric families for both the value function and the policy, using low-degree polynomial approximations to the ODE solutions. We then develop an actor-critic RL algorithm to learn the optimal exploratory policy through interactions with the market environment: it performs belief-state filtering from observed data and iterates policy evaluation and policy improvement online to refine the policy. Numerical experiments demonstrate strong out-of-sample performance of the learned dividend policies.

AI.tldr: 研究部分观测机制转换扩散模型中有界支付率的最优分红问题，提出基于探索性随机控制的连续时间强化学习方法，通过actor-critic算法学习最优分红策略
AI.motivation: 实际金融市场中，市场机制通常不可观测且关键模型参数未知，传统完全信息假设下的最优分红问题难以适用，需要解决部分信息环境下的最优分红决策问题
AI.method: 在探索性（熵正则化）随机控制框架下，提出连续时间强化学习方法；通过半解析方法求解探索性HJB系统，使用低阶多项式逼近ODE解，开发actor-critic算法在线学习最优策略
AI.result: 数值实验表明学习到的分红策略具有强大的样本外性能，能够有效处理机制不可观测和参数未知的实际市场环境
AI.conclusion: 该研究成功将连续时间强化学习应用于部分观测机制转换模型中的最优分红问题，提出的方法能够有效处理实际市场中的信息不完全问题，为金融决策提供了新的解决方案

title: Local Regularity Estimation through Sobolev-Scale Norm Profile
summary: We develop a kernel-based approach for estimating the spatially varying Sobolev regularity~$s$ of an unknown $d$-variate function~$f$ from scattered sampling data, which quantifies the degree of local differentiability supported by the data. Relying only on neighborhood data near the point of interest $z\in Ω_z$, our method constructs a sequence of Sobolev-space reproducing kernel interpolants whose kernel smoothness order is specified by an index~$m > d/2$. The native-space norms of these interpolants are evaluated over a bounded range of~$m$, producing a \emph{Sobolev-scale norm profile}. The elbow of this profile serves as a quantitative probe of the underlying local regularity~$s(Ω_z)$. In particular, when $m > s(Ω_z)$, the profile exhibits rapid, near-worst-case growth governed by the classical upper bound associated with the conditioning of the kernel matrix. A band-limited surrogate analysis explains this transition and establishes a lower-bound relation linking native-norm growth to the Sobolev regularity of~$f$. Two complementary strategies are incorporated for further enhancement: (i)~a \emph{stencil-shift} subroutine, which repositions local neighborhoods to avoid crossing discontinuities whenever possible, thereby suppressing artifacts in the norm estimates; and (ii)~a local--global \emph{norm-sweep comparison} strategy that combines short two-point local tails with an optional one-point global screen to detect outlier $Ω_z$ of low Sobolev regularity and accelerate evaluation on large datasets. Numerical experiments on synthetic test functions and turbulent-flow data demonstrate accurate recovery of spatially varying regularity and confirm the robustness of the proposed characterization for kernel-based approximation and differentiation.

AI.tldr: 提出基于核方法的局部Sobolev正则性估计方法，通过核插值器的原生空间范数剖面来量化函数局部可微性
AI.motivation: 需要从散乱采样数据中估计未知多元函数的空间变化Sobolev正则性，量化数据支持的局部可微程度
AI.method: 使用Sobolev空间再生核插值器，通过核光滑度参数m构造范数剖面，利用剖面拐点估计局部正则性s；结合邻域重定位和局部-全局范数扫描策略增强鲁棒性
AI.result: 数值实验表明方法能准确恢复空间变化的正则性，在合成测试函数和湍流数据上验证了鲁棒性
AI.conclusion: 提出的核基方法能有效估计局部Sobolev正则性，为基于核的逼近和微分提供了鲁棒的表征工具

title: Convergence Analysis of Randomized Subspace Normalized SGD under Heavy-Tailed Noise
summary: Randomized subspace methods reduce per-iteration cost; however, in nonconvex optimization, most analyses are expectation-based, and high-probability bounds remain scarce even under sub-Gaussian noise. We first prove that randomized subspace SGD (RS-SGD) admits a high-probability convergence bound under sub-Gaussian noise, achieving the same order of oracle complexity as prior in-expectation results. Motivated by the prevalence of heavy-tailed gradients in modern machine learning, we then propose randomized subspace normalized SGD (RS-NSGD), which integrates direction normalization into subspace updates. Assuming the noise has bounded $p$-th moments, we establish both in-expectation and high-probability convergence guarantees, and show that RS-NSGD can achieve better oracle complexity than full-dimensional normalized SGD.

AI.tldr: 论文提出两种随机子空间优化方法：RS-SGD在亚高斯噪声下获得高概率收敛保证；RS-NSGD针对重尾梯度噪声，通过方向归一化改进收敛性，在某些情况下优于全维归一化SGD。
AI.motivation: 随机子空间方法能降低每次迭代成本，但在非凸优化中，现有分析多为期望收敛，即使在亚高斯噪声下也缺乏高概率收敛保证。现代机器学习中重尾梯度噪声普遍存在，需要更鲁棒的算法。
AI.method: 1. 随机子空间SGD (RS-SGD)：在亚高斯噪声下证明高概率收敛性；2. 随机子空间归一化SGD (RS-NSGD)：在子空间更新中集成方向归一化，适用于有界p阶矩的噪声。
AI.result: RS-SGD在亚高斯噪声下获得与先前期望收敛相同阶的oracle复杂度高概率收敛界；RS-NSGD在有界p阶矩噪声下获得期望和高概率收敛保证，在某些情况下比全维归一化SGD具有更好的oracle复杂度。
AI.conclusion: 随机子空间方法在降低计算成本的同时，通过适当设计（如方向归一化）可以获得鲁棒的收敛保证，特别是在处理重尾梯度噪声时表现出优势。

title: A low regularity exponential-type integrator for the derivative nonlinear Schrödinger equation
summary: In this work, we present a first-order unfiltered exponential integrator for the one-dimensional derivative nonlinear Schrödinger equation with low regularity. Our analysis shows that for any $s>\frac12$, the method converges with first-order in $H^s(\mathbb{T})$ for initial data $u_0\in H^{s+1}(\mathbb{T})$. Moreover, we constructed a symmetrized version of this method that performs better in terms of both global error and conservation behavior. To the best of our knowledge, these are the first low regularity integrators for the derivative nonlinear Schrödinger equation. Numerical experiments illustrate our theoretical findings.

AI.tldr: 提出了一阶无滤波指数积分器用于一维导数非线性薛定谔方程的低正则性求解，并构造了对称化版本改进精度和守恒性。
AI.motivation: 针对导数非线性薛定谔方程在低正则性条件下的数值求解问题，目前缺乏专门的低正则性积分器，需要开发能够处理低正则性初始数据的数值方法。
AI.method: 提出了一阶无滤波指数积分器，并构造了对称化版本。方法适用于初始数据u₀∈H^{s+1}(𝕋)，在H^s(𝕋)空间中具有一阶收敛性（s>1/2）。
AI.result: 对于任意s>1/2，该方法在H^s(𝕋)空间中具有一阶收敛性，对称化版本在全局误差和守恒行为方面表现更优。这是首个针对导数非线性薛定谔方程的低正则性积分器。
AI.conclusion: 成功开发了首个针对导数非线性薛定谔方程的低正则性积分器，对称化版本进一步提升了数值性能，数值实验验证了理论结果。

title: Sufficiently Regularized Nonnegative Quartic Polynomials are Sum-of-Squares
summary: Hilbert's 17th problem famously established that not all nonnegative polynomials admit a sum-of-squares (SoS) representation. Hilbert also identified a few special classes in which nonnegativity and SoS are equivalent, such as univariate polynomials, quadratic polynomials, and bivariate quartic polynomials. In this paper, we extend this equivalence to several new subclasses of multivariate quartically regularized polynomials and characterize the NP-hardness boundary of these special-structure polynomials. Specifically, we consider the global optimization of multivariate symmetric cubic polynomials regularized by weighted quartic powers of the Euclidean norm. These special-structure polynomials arise as iterative subproblems in high-order tensor methods for nonconvex optimization problems. We consider shifting these polynomials by their global optimum so as to make them nonnegative, and show that for sufficiently large regularization parameters and under mild assumptions, these polynomials admit a sum-of-squares representation. We also identify several structured subclasses of quartically regularized cubic polynomials for which global optimality of the model implies that nonnegativity is certified by a sum-of-squares decomposition for all values of the regularization parameter, including quadratic-quartic polynomials and quartic polynomials containing a special cubic term that can be decomposed as the product of a quadratic norm and a linear form. We provide counterexamples based on quartic separable norms that demonstrate the crucial role of the Euclidean norm in these representations. Finally, we illustrate how these SoS-based certificates can be used for Taylor subproblems arising in high-order tensor methods for nonconvex optimization, with encouraging numerical results.

AI.tldr: 该论文将希尔伯特关于非负多项式与平方和表示等价性的经典结果扩展到多元四次正则化多项式的几个新子类，并刻画了这些特殊结构多项式的NP难解性边界。
AI.motivation: 希尔伯特第17问题表明并非所有非负多项式都有平方和表示，但某些特殊类别存在等价性。本文旨在将这种等价性扩展到多元四次正则化多项式的新子类，这些多项式作为高阶张量方法中的迭代子问题出现，对于非凸优化具有重要意义。
AI.method: 研究多元对称三次多项式经加权四次欧几里得范数正则化后的全局优化问题。通过将多项式平移至其全局最优值使其非负，证明在足够大的正则化参数和温和假设下，这些多项式存在平方和表示。识别了几种结构化子类，包括二次-四次多项式和包含特殊三次项的四次多项式。
AI.result: 对于足够大的正则化参数，在温和假设下，这些正则化多项式存在平方和表示。识别了全局最优性自动保证平方和分解的结构化子类。通过四次可分离范数的反例证明了欧几里得范数在这些表示中的关键作用。数值结果表明这些平方和证书在高阶张量方法的泰勒子问题中具有应用前景。
AI.conclusion: 成功将希尔伯特的等价性结果扩展到多元四次正则化多项式的多个新子类，为高阶张量方法中的非凸优化问题提供了理论保证和实用工具，同时通过反例揭示了欧几里得范数在平方和表示中的必要性。

title: A Unified Variational Functional for Equidistribution and Alignment in Moving Mesh Adaptation
summary: Existing variational mesh functionals often suffer from strong nonlinearity or dependence on empirical parameters.We propose a new variational functional for adaptive moving mesh generation that enforces equidistribution and alignment through an $\boldsymbol A$-pullback formulation, where $\boldsymbol A=\boldsymbol J^{-1}\boldsymbol M^{-1}\boldsymbol J^{-T}$. The functional combines a trace-based term with a logarithmic determinant term, achieving balanced control of mesh size and anisotropy without empirical parameters. We establish coercivity, polyconvexity, existence of minimizers, and geodesic convexity with respect to the inverse Jacobian, and derive a simplified geometric discretization leading to an efficient moving mesh algorithm. Numerical experiments confirm the theoretical properties and demonstrate robust adaptive behavior for function-induced meshes and Rayleigh-Taylor instability simulations.

AI.tldr: 提出新的变分网格泛函，通过A-拉回公式实现自适应移动网格生成，无需经验参数，平衡控制网格尺寸和各向异性
AI.motivation: 现有变分网格泛函存在强非线性或依赖经验参数的问题，需要一种更稳健、无需经验参数的自适应移动网格生成方法
AI.method: 提出基于A-拉回公式的新变分泛函，其中A=J⁻¹M⁻¹J⁻ᵀ，结合迹项和对数行列式项，实现网格均匀分布和对齐控制
AI.result: 建立了泛函的强制性、多凸性、极小值存在性以及关于逆雅可比矩阵的测地凸性，开发了简化的几何离散化算法
AI.conclusion: 新方法无需经验参数，能稳健生成自适应网格，数值实验验证了理论性质并在函数诱导网格和Rayleigh-Taylor不稳定性模拟中表现出色

title: Adaptive Conditional Gradient Sliding: Projection-Free and Line-Search-Free Acceleration
summary: We study convex optimization problems over a compact convex set where projections are expensive but a linear minimization oracle (LMO) is available. We propose the adaptive conditional gradient sliding method (AdCGS), a projection-free and line-search-free method that retains Nesterov's acceleration with adaptive stepsizes based on local Lipschitz estimates. AdCGS combines an accelerated outer scheme with an LMO-based inner routine. It reuses gradients across multiple LMO calls to reduce gradient evaluations, while controlling the subproblem inexactness via a prescribed accuracy level coupled with adaptive stepsizes. We prove accelerated convergence rates for convex objective functions matching those of projection-based accelerated methods, while requiring no projection oracle. For strongly convex objective functions, we further establish linear convergence without additional geometric assumptions on the constraint set, such as polytopes or strongly convex sets. Experiments on constrained $\ell_p$ regression, logistic regression with real-world datasets, and least-squares problems demonstrate improvements over both projection-free and projection-based baselines.

AI.tldr: AdCGS是一种无需投影和线搜索的加速条件梯度滑动方法，在只有线性最小化预言机的情况下实现Nesterov加速，收敛速度与基于投影的加速方法相当。
AI.motivation: 在凸优化问题中，当投影操作昂贵但线性最小化预言机可用时，需要开发无需投影的加速方法。现有方法要么需要投影，要么缺乏加速收敛保证，特别是在强凸函数上需要额外的几何假设。
AI.method: AdCGS结合了加速外部方案和基于LMO的内部例程，使用基于局部Lipschitz估计的自适应步长，通过重用梯度减少梯度计算次数，并通过预设精度水平控制子问题的不精确性。
AI.result: 对于凸目标函数，AdCGS实现了与基于投影的加速方法相匹配的加速收敛率；对于强凸函数，无需约束集的额外几何假设（如多面体或强凸集）即可获得线性收敛。实验在约束ℓ_p回归、真实数据集逻辑回归和最小二乘问题上显示优于基线方法。
AI.conclusion: AdCGS在只有线性最小化预言机的情况下实现了Nesterov加速，无需投影操作，为投影昂贵的凸优化问题提供了高效的投影自由解决方案。

title: Element-based B-spline basis function spaces: construction and application in isogeometric analysis
summary: This paper develops a unified theoretical framework for constructing B-spline basis function spaces with structural equivalence to finite element spaces. The theory rigorously establishes that these bases emerge as explicit linear combinations of B-spline element bases. For any prescribed smoothness requirements, this element-wise formulation enables the Hermite interpolation at nodes, which directly utilizes function values and derivatives without solving global linear systems. By focusing on explicit interpolation properties, element-wise analysis establishes optimal approximation errors, even when the space smoothness attains its theoretical maximum for the space degree. In isogeometric analysis (IgA), the construction naturally decomposes geometric mappings into element-level representations, allowing efficient computations across elements regardless of node distribution. Notably, the same Hermite interpolation framework simultaneously handles domain parameterization and IgA solutions, allowing direct imposition of boundary conditions through function and derivative matching. Numerical tests demonstrate optimal convergence rates and superconvergence properties in 2D IgA under uniform knot configurations, and improved computational efficiency in 3D IgA with non-uniform knot distributions.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一个统一的理论框架，用于构建与有限元空间结构等价的B样条基函数空间，通过元素级表示实现Hermite插值，无需求解全局线性系统，在等几何分析中具有高效计算优势。
AI.motivation: 在等几何分析中，传统方法需要求解全局线性系统来处理边界条件和插值问题。本文旨在开发一个理论框架，能够直接通过元素级B样条基函数实现Hermite插值，避免全局求解，提高计算效率。
AI.method: 建立统一理论框架，证明B样条基函数空间可通过B样条元素基的显式线性组合构造。采用元素级表示方法，实现节点处的Hermite插值，直接利用函数值和导数值。在等几何分析中，将几何映射分解为元素级表示。
AI.result: 理论证明了B样条基函数空间与有限元空间的结构等价性。数值测试显示：在2D等几何分析中，均匀节点配置下获得最优收敛率和超收敛特性；在3D等几何分析中，非均匀节点分布下计算效率显著提升。
AI.conclusion: 该框架成功构建了与有限元空间结构等价的B样条基函数空间，实现了无需全局求解的Hermite插值，在等几何分析中同时处理几何参数化和数值解，直接施加边界条件，具有计算高效性和理论最优性。

title: On controllability, observability and stabilizability of the heat equation on discrete graphs
summary: We consider linear control problems for the heat equation of the form $\dot f (t) = -Hf (t) + \mathbf{1}_D u (t)$, $f (0) \in \ell_2 (X,m)$, where $H$ is the weighted Laplacian on a discrete graph $(X,b,m)$, and where $D \subseteq X$ is relatively dense. We show cost-uniform $α$-controllability by means of a weak observability estimate for the corresponding dual observation problem. We discuss optimality of our result as well as consequences on stabilizability properties.

AI.tldr: 研究离散图上热方程的线性控制问题，证明通过弱可观测性估计实现成本均匀的α-可控性，并讨论结果的最优性和稳定性含义
AI.motivation: 研究离散图上热方程的线性控制问题，其中控制作用在相对稠密集上，旨在建立成本均匀的α-可控性，这对于理解离散空间上分布参数系统的控制理论具有重要意义

title: A note on approximation in weighted Korobov spaces via multiple rank-1 lattices
summary: This paper studies the multivariate approximation of functions in weighted Korobov spaces using multiple rank-1 lattice rules. It has been shown by Kämmerer and Volkmer (2019) that algorithms based on multiple rank-1 lattices achieve the optimal convergence rate for the $L_{\infty}$ error in Wiener-type spaces, up to logarithmic factors. While this result was translated to weighted Korobov spaces in the recent monograph by Dick, Kritzer, and Pillichshammer (2022), the analysis requires the smoothness parameter $α$ to be greater than $1$ and is restricted to product weights. In this paper, we extend this result for multiple rank-1 lattice-based algorithms to the case where $1/2<α\le 1$ and for general weights, covering a broader range of periodic functions with low smoothness and general relative importance of variables. We also provide a summability condition on the weights to ensure strong polynomial tractability for any $α>1/2$. Furthermore, by incorporating random shifts into multiple rank-1 lattice-based algorithms, we prove that the resulting randomized algorithm achieves a nearly optimal convergence rate in terms of the worst-case root mean squared $L_2$ error, while retaining the same tractability property.

AI.tldr: 本文扩展了多重秩-1格点算法在加权Korobov空间中的应用，将适用范围从α>1扩展到1/2<α≤1，并支持一般权重，同时证明了随机化算法的最优收敛率
AI.motivation: 先前研究仅适用于α>1的平滑参数和乘积权重，限制了算法对低平滑度周期函数和一般变量重要性的适用性，需要扩展理论框架
AI.method: 使用多重秩-1格点算法，扩展分析到1/2<α≤1的平滑参数范围，支持一般权重，并引入随机偏移创建随机化算法

title: Drone-Aided Blood Collection Routing Problem: A Column Generation Approach
summary: Platelet extraction requires whole blood to be processed within six hours of donation. To meet this deadline, blood collection organizations must optimally route a fleet of vehicles to pick up blood units from donation sites and deliver them to a processing center. This paper introduces a drone-aided blood collection routing problem in which a fleet of trucks, each equipped with a drone, operates in a synchronized manner to collect blood units before their processing time limit expires. Each truck-drone tandem can perform multiple trips throughout the planning horizon, allowing donation sites to be visited repeatedly as new blood units become available over time. We formulate this problem as a mixed-integer linear program that jointly optimizes the routing of trucks and drones, pickup schedules, and timing decisions to maximize the total number of viable blood units collected. We also develop a column generation approach that decomposes the problem into a master problem to select the optimal set of truck-drone tours and a pricing subproblem, which is solved using a tailored memetic algorithm to generate promising new columns. Through a comprehensive computational study, we show the operational benefits of integrating drones into the blood collection system. In addition, we demonstrate the superior performance of the proposed algorithm over Gurobi and two metaheuristics from the literature, namely the hybrid genetic algorithm and the invasive weed optimization, in both the drone-aided and truck-only settings.

title: Refined rates of convergence for target-data dependent greedy generalized interpolation with Sobolev kernels
summary: Greedy methods have recently been successfully applied to generalized kernel interpolation, or the recovery of a function from data stemming from the evaluation of linear functionals, including the approximation of solutions of linear PDEs by symmetric collocation. When applied to kernels generating Sobolev spaces as their native Hilbert spaces, some of these greedy methods can provide the same error guarantee of generalized interpolation on quasi-uniform points. More importantly, certain target-data-adaptive methods even give a dimension- and smoothness-independent improvement in the speed of convergence over quasi-uniform points, thus offering advantages for high-dimensional problems. These convergence rates however contain a spurious logarithmic term that limits this beneficial effect. The goal of this note is to remove this factor, and this is possible by using estimates on metric entropy numbers.

AI.tldr: 本文通过度量熵数估计，移除了贪婪方法在广义核插值中的对数项，改进了高维问题的收敛速度
AI.motivation: 贪婪方法在广义核插值中已成功应用，但现有收敛速率包含限制高维问题优势的对数项，需要移除这一因子以充分发挥方法优势
AI.method: 使用度量熵数估计来分析和改进贪婪方法的收敛速率，特别针对生成Sobolev空间的核函数
AI.result: 成功移除了收敛速率中的对数项，使得目标数据自适应方法能够实现与准均匀点相比的维度和平滑度无关的收敛速度改进

title: Adaptive Dimension Reduction for Overlapping Group Sparsity
summary: Typical dimension reduction techniques for nonoverlapping sparse optimization involve screening or sieving strategies based on a dual certificate derived from the first-order optimality condition, approximating the gradients or exploiting certain inherent low-dimensional structure of the sparse solution. In comparison, dimension reduction rules for overlapping group sparsity are generally less developed because the subgradient structure is more complex, making the link between sparsity pattern and the dual variable indirect due to the non-separability. In this work, we propose new dual certificates for overlapping group sparsity and a novel adaptive scheme for identifying the support of the overlapping group LASSO. We demonstrate how this scheme can be integrated into and significantly accelerate existing algorithms, including Primal-Dual splitting method, alternating direction method of multipliers and a recently developed variable projection scheme based on over-parameterization. We provide convergence analysis of the method and verify its practical effectiveness through experiments on standard datasets.

title: A penalty-interior point method combined with MADS for equality and inequality constrained optimization
summary: This work introduces MADS-PIP, an efficient framework that integrates a penalty-interior point strategy into the mesh adaptive direct search (MADS) algorithm for solving nonsmooth blackbox optimization problems with general inequality and equality constraints. Inequality constraints are partitioned into two subsets: one treated via a logarithmic barrier applied to an aggregated interior constraint violation, and the other handled through an exterior quadratic penalty. All equality constraints are treated by the exterior penalty. A merit function defines a sequence of unconstrained subproblems, which are solved approximately using MADS, while a carefully designed update rule drives the penalty-barrier parameter to zero. In the nonsmooth setting, we establish convergence results ensuring feasibility for general constraints as well as Clarke stationarity for inequality-constrained problems. Computational experiments on both analytical test sets and challenging blackbox problems demonstrate that the proposed MADS-PIP algorithm is competitive with, and often outperforms, MADS with the progressive barrier strategy, particularly in the presence of equality constraints.

AI.tldr: MADS-PIP框架将惩罚-内点策略集成到MADS算法中，用于求解带一般不等式和等式约束的非光滑黑盒优化问题，在等式约束处理方面表现优异。
AI.motivation: 现有MADS算法在处理一般不等式和等式约束时存在局限性，特别是等式约束处理不够有效，需要开发更强大的约束处理框架。
AI.method: 将不等式约束分为两个子集：一部分通过内点对数障碍函数处理，另一部分通过外部二次惩罚处理；所有等式约束通过外部惩罚处理。通过罚函数定义一系列无约束子问题，用MADS近似求解，并设计参数更新规则驱动惩罚-障碍参数趋于零。
AI.result: 建立了非光滑设置下的收敛性结果，确保一般约束的可行性以及不等式约束问题的Clarke平稳性。计算实验表明MADS-PIP在解析测试集和挑战性黑盒问题上具有竞争力，特别是在等式约束存在时通常优于渐进障碍策略的MADS。
AI.conclusion: MADS-PIP是一个有效的框架，成功将惩罚-内点策略集成到MADS中，显著提升了处理一般约束特别是等式约束的能力，为黑盒优化提供了有竞争力的新方法。

title: Monotone-based Numerical Schemes for Two-Dimensional Systems of Nonlocal Conservation Laws
summary: We present a class of numerical schemes for two-dimensional systems of nonlocal conservation laws, which are based on utilizing well-known monotone numerical flux functions after suitably approximating the nonlocal terms. The considered systems are weakly coupled by the nonlocal terms and the underlying flux function is rather general to guarantee that our results are applicable to a wide range of common nonlocal models. We state sufficient conditions to ensure the convergence of the monotone-based numerical schemes to the unique weak entropy solution. Moreover, we provide an error estimate that yields the convergence rate of $\mathcal{O}(\sqrt{Δt})$ for the numerical approximations of the solution. Our results include an existence and uniqueness proof of the nonlocal system, too. Numerical results illustrate our theoretical findings.

AI.tldr: 提出基于单调数值通量函数的二维非局部守恒律系统数值格式，通过适当逼近非局部项，证明格式收敛到唯一弱熵解，并给出收敛率估计。

AI.method: 通过适当逼近非局部项，利用已知的单调数值通量函数构建数值格式。系统通过非局部项弱耦合，通量函数设计为通用形式以确保广泛适用性。建立充分条件保证格式收敛到唯一弱熵解。

title: Local convergence analysis of a linearized Alikhanov scheme for the time fractional sine-Gordon equation
summary: This paper investigates the time fractional sine-Gordon equation whose solution exhibits a weak singularity of type t^α. By means of the Alikhanov formula we derive a fully discrete, linearized scheme. Using the more general regularity assumption, we derive a sharp truncation-error bound for the fractional derivative. Furthermore, we prove a key inequality and a less restrictive stability result that is valid on general graded temporal meshes. Consequently, the temporal local convergence order is shown to be min{2, r} in H^1-seminorm, where r is the degree of grading; numerical experiments confirm that the optimal rate is already attained as soon as r = 2.

AI.tldr: 本文研究具有t^α型弱奇异性的时间分数阶sine-Gordon方程，采用Alikhanov公式构建全离散线性化格式，在更一般的正则性假设下获得分数阶导数的尖锐截断误差界，证明了关键不等式和适用于一般分级时间网格的稳定性结果，最终得到H^1半范数下min{2,r}的时间局部收敛阶。
AI.motivation: 研究具有弱奇异性的时间分数阶sine-Gordon方程数值解法，解决传统方法在处理此类奇异问题时收敛阶下降的问题，提高数值模拟的精度和效率。
AI.method: 采用Alikhanov公式推导全离散线性化格式；在更一般的正则性假设下分析分数阶导数的截断误差；证明关键不等式和适用于一般分级时间网格的稳定性结果。
AI.result: 获得了分数阶导数的尖锐截断误差界；证明了关键不等式和更宽松的稳定性条件；在H^1半范数下得到min{2,r}的时间局部收敛阶，其中r为分级度；数值实验表明当r=2时即可达到最优收敛率。
AI.conclusion: 本文提出的方法能有效处理具有弱奇异性的时间分数阶sine-Gordon方程，在一般分级时间网格上获得理论保证的收敛阶，数值实验验证了理论结果的正确性，为这类问题的数值求解提供了有效工具。

title: Quantitative synthetic aperture radar inversion
comment: Submitted to IEEE Transactions on Antennas and Propagation, keywords: SAR, imaging, multiple scattering, inversion
summary:
We study an inverse scattering problem for monostatic synthetic aperture radar (SAR): Estimate the wave speed in a heterogeneous, isotropic and nonmagnetic medium probed by waves emitted and measured by a moving antenna. The forward map, from the wave speed to the measurements, is derived from Maxwell's equations. It is a nonlinear map that accounts for multiple scattering and it is very oscillatory at high frequencies. This makes the standard, nonlinear least squares data fitting formulation of the inverse problem difficult to solve. We introduce an alternative, two-step approach: The first step computes the nonlinear map from the measurements to an approximation of the electric field inside the unknown medium aka, the internal wave. This is done for each antenna location in a non-iterative manner.
  The internal wave fits the data by construction, but it does not solve Maxwell's equations. The second step uses optimization to minimize the discrepancy between the internal wave and the solution of Maxwell's equations, for all antenna locations. The optimization is iterative. The first step defines an imaging function whose computational cost is comparable to that of standard SAR imaging, but it gives a better estimate of the support of targets. Further iterations improve the quantitative estimation of the wave speed. We assess the performance of the method with numerical simulations and compare the results with those of standard inversion.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种解决单基地合成孔径雷达（SAR）逆散射问题的两步法：第一步从测量数据非迭代地计算近似电场（内部波），第二步通过优化迭代最小化内部波与麦克斯韦方程解之间的差异。
AI.motivation: 传统基于非线性最小二乘数据拟合的逆散射问题求解方法在高频下难以处理，因为前向映射（从波速到测量）是非线性且高度振荡的。需要一种更有效的替代方法来解决单基地SAR中的波速估计问题。
AI.method: 采用两步法：第一步对每个天线位置非迭代地计算从测量数据到介质内部近似电场（内部波）的非线性映射；第二步通过迭代优化最小化所有天线位置下内部波与麦克斯韦方程解之间的差异。
AI.result: 第一步成像函数的计算成本与标准SAR成像相当，但能更好地估计目标支撑集；进一步迭代能改善波速的定量估计。数值模拟验证了该方法优于标准反演方法。
AI.conclusion: 提出的两步法为单基地SAR逆散射问题提供了一种有效的解决方案，既能保持计算效率，又能提高波速估计的准确性，特别适用于高频情况下的异构介质波速重建。

title: Unconditional full linear convergence and quasi-optimal complexity of smoothed adaptive finite element methods
summary: We present the first rigorous convergence analysis of the smoothed adaptive finite element method (S-AFEM) proposed in [Mulita, Giani, Heltai: SIAM J. Sci. Comput. 43, 2021]. S-AFEM modifies the classical adaptive finite element method (AFEM) by performing accurate discrete solves only on periodically determined mesh levels, while the intermediate levels employ a fixed number of cheap smoothing iterations. Numerical experiments in that work showed that this strategy generates adapted meshes comparable to those of AFEM at substantially lower computational cost. In this paper, we prove unconditional full R-linear convergence of a suitable quasi-error quantity and, for sufficiently small adaptivity parameters, optimal convergence rates with respect to the overall computational cost. The analysis requires only a mild uniform stability assumption on the employed smoother, satisfied by standard methods such as Richardson, Gauss-Seidel, conjugate gradient, and multigrid schemes. Our results apply to general second-order linear elliptic PDEs and show that S-AFEM retains all desired abstract convergence guarantees of AFEM while reducing the cumulative computational time. Numerical experiments validate the theory, analyze runtime performance, and underline the potential of S-AFEM for speed-up in AFEM computations.

AI.tldr: 对平滑自适应有限元法(S-AFEM)进行首次严格收敛性分析，证明其在保持AFEM收敛性的同时显著降低计算成本
AI.motivation: S-AFEM通过在周期性确定的网格层级上进行精确离散求解，而在中间层级使用固定次数的廉价平滑迭代，从而在保持网格质量的同时降低计算成本。需要对其收敛性进行严格的理论分析
AI.method: 采用数学分析方法，证明S-AFEM的无条件完全R线性收敛性，并在足够小的自适应参数下，证明相对于总体计算成本的最优收敛率。分析仅需满足温和的均匀稳定性假设
AI.result: 证明了S-AFEM保持AFEM所有期望的抽象收敛保证，同时减少累积计算时间。数值实验验证了理论，分析了运行时性能，并突显了S-AFEM在加速AFEM计算方面的潜力
AI.conclusion: S-AFEM在保持经典AFEM收敛性的同时，通过智能地结合精确求解和平滑迭代，实现了显著的计算成本降低，为有限元计算提供了高效的替代方案

title: Adaptive domain decomposition method for time-dependent problems with applications in fluid dynamics
summary: We deal with the numerical solution of the time-dependent partial differential equations using the adaptive space-time discontinuous Galerkin (DG) method. The discretization leads to a nonlinear algebraic system at each time level, the size of the system is varying due to mesh adaptation. A Newton-like iterative solver leads to a sequence of linear algebraic systems which are solved by GMRES solver with a domain decomposition preconditioner. Particularly, we consider additive and hybrid two-level Schwarz preconditioners which are efficient and easy to implement for DG discretization. We study the convergence of the linear solver in dependence on the number of subdomains and the number of element of the coarse grid. We propose a simplified cost model measuring the computational costs in terms of floating-point operations, the speed of computation, and the wall-clock time for communications among computer cores. Moreover, the cost model serves as a base of the presented adaptive domain decomposition method which chooses the number of subdomains and the number of element of the coarse grid in order to minimize the computational costs. The efficiency of the proposed technique is demonstrated by two benchmark problems of compressible flow simulations.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种用于时空自适应不连续伽辽金方法求解时变偏微分方程的自适应域分解方法，通过优化子域数量和粗网格元素数量来最小化计算成本。
AI.motivation: 在求解时变偏微分方程时，自适应空间-时间不连续伽辽金方法在每个时间层产生非线性代数系统，且系统规模因网格自适应而变化。需要高效的线性求解器和预处理技术来处理这些变化规模的系统。
AI.method: 采用牛顿类迭代求解器产生线性代数系统序列，使用GMRES求解器配合域分解预处理器。特别考虑了加性和混合两级Schwarz预处理器，这些对DG离散化高效且易于实现。提出了简化的成本模型来衡量浮点运算、计算速度和通信时间的计算成本，并基于此开发自适应域分解方法，优化子域数量和粗网格元素数量。
AI.result: 研究了线性求解器收敛性对子域数量和粗网格元素数量的依赖性。提出的自适应域分解方法能够选择最优的子域数量和粗网格元素数量以最小化计算成本。通过两个可压缩流动模拟的基准问题验证了所提技术的效率。
AI.conclusion: 提出的自适应域分解方法结合简化的成本模型，能够有效优化计算资源分配，显著提高时空自适应不连续伽辽金方法求解时变偏微分方程的计算效率，在可压缩流动模拟中表现出良好性能。

title: Optimal Sensor Placement in Gaussian Processes via Column Subset Selection
summary: Gaussian process regression uses data measured at sensor locations to reconstruct a spatially dependent function with quantified uncertainty. However, if only a limited number of sensors can be deployed, it is important to determine how to optimally place the sensors to minimize a measure of the uncertainty in the reconstruction. We consider the Bayesian D-optimal criterion to determine the optimal sensor locations by choosing sensors from a candidate set of sensors. Since this is an NP-hard problem, our approach models sensor placement as a column subset selection problem (CSSP) on the covariance matrix, computed using the kernel function on the candidate sensor points. We propose an algorithm that uses the Golub-Klema-Stewart framework (GKS) to select sensors and provide an analysis of lower bounds on the D-optimality of these sensor placements. To reduce the computational cost in the GKS step, we propose and analyze algorithms for the D-optimal sensor placements using Nyström approximations on the covariance matrix. Moreover, we propose several algorithms that select sensors via Nyström approximation of the covariance matrix, utilizing the randomized Nyström approximation, random pivoted Cholesky and greedy pivoted Cholesky. We demonstrate the performance of our method on two applications: thin liquid film dynamics and sea surface temperature.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种基于列子集选择问题的高斯过程回归传感器优化布置方法，使用Golub-Klema-Stewart框架和Nyström近似来降低计算成本，并在薄膜动力学和海面温度两个应用中进行验证。

AI.method: 将传感器布置建模为协方差矩阵的列子集选择问题，提出基于Golub-Klema-Stewart框架的算法，并引入Nyström近似（包括随机Nyström近似、随机枢轴Cholesky和贪心枢轴Cholesky）来降低计算成本。
AI.result: 提出了多种传感器选择算法，分析了这些算法在D最优性方面的下界，并在薄液膜动力学和海面温度两个实际应用中验证了方法的性能。
AI.conclusion: 通过将传感器布置问题转化为列子集选择问题，并利用Nyström近似技术，本文提出了一系列高效的计算方法，能够在保证D最优性的同时显著降低计算复杂度，适用于大规模传感器布置问题。

title: Jacobi Hamiltonian Integrators: construction and applications
summary: We propose a systematic framework for constructing geometric integrators for Hamiltonian systems on Jacobi manifolds. By combining Poissonization of Jacobi structures with homogeneous symplectic bi-realizations, Jacobi dynamics are lifted to homogeneous Poisson Hamiltonian systems, enabling the construction of structure-preserving Jacobi Hamiltonian integrators. The resulting schemes are constructed explicitly and applied to a range of examples, including contact Hamiltonian systems and classical models. Numerical experiments highlight their qualitative advantages over standard integrators, including better preservation of geometric structure and improved long-time behavior.

title: A locking-free mixed virtual element discretization for the elasticity eigenvalue problem
summary: In this paper, we introduce a mixed virtual element method to approximate the eigenvalues and eigenfunctions of the two-dimensional elasticity eigenvalue problem. Under standard assumptions on the meshes, we prove the convergence of the discrete solution operator to the continuous one as the mesh size tends to zero. Using the theory of compact operators, we analyze the convergence of the method and derive error estimates for both the eigenvalues and eigenfunctions. We validate our theoretical results with a series of numerical tests, in which we compute convergence orders and show that the method is locking-free and capable of accurately approximating the spectrum independently of the shape of the polygons on the meshes.

title: Fast Solvers for the Reynolds Equation on Piecewise Linear Geometries
summary: The Reynolds equation is derived from the incompressible Navier Stokes equations under the lubrication assumptions of a long and thin domain geometry and a small scaled Reynolds number. The Reynolds equation is an elliptic differential equation and a dramatic simplification from the governing equations. When the fluid domain is piecewise linear, the Reynolds equation has an exact solution that we formulate by coupling the exact solutions of each piecewise component. We consider a formulation specifically for piecewise constant heights, and a more general formulation for piecewise linear heights; in both cases the linear system is inverted using the Schur complement. These methods can also be applied in the case of non-linear heights by approximating the height as piecewise constant or piecewise linear, in which case the methods achieve second order accuracy. We assess the time complexity of the two methods, and determine that the method for piecewise linear heights is linear time for the number of piecewise components. As an application of these methods, we explore the limits of validity for lubrication theory by comparing the solutions of the Reynolds and the Stokes equations for a variety of linear and non-linear textured slider geometries.

AI.tldr: 该论文从不可压缩Navier-Stokes方程推导出Reynolds方程，针对分段线性流体域提出了精确解法，并评估了润滑理论的有效性范围。
AI.motivation: 研究Reynolds方程在分段线性几何域中的精确求解方法，以简化润滑理论计算并验证其适用范围。
AI.method: 从Navier-Stokes方程推导Reynolds方程，针对分段常数高度和分段线性高度两种情况，通过Schur补方法求解线性系统，并应用于非线性高度的近似计算。
AI.result: 分段线性高度方法具有线性时间复杂度，二阶精度，并通过比较Reynolds方程和Stokes方程解来验证润滑理论的有效性范围。
AI.conclusion: 提出的分段线性方法能高效精确求解Reynolds方程，为润滑理论在纹理滑块几何中的应用提供了有效工具，并确定了理论适用范围。
